00031 Q_DEFINE_THIS_MODULE(qeq_lifo)

00037 //............................................................................
00038 void QEQueue::postLIFO(QEvent const *e) {
00039     QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00040     QF_INT_LOCK_();
00041 
00042     QS_BEGIN_NOLOCK_(QS_QF_EQUEUE_POST_LIFO, QS::eqObj_, this)
00043         QS_TIME_();                                               // timestamp
00044         QS_SIG_(e->sig);                           // the signal of this event
00045         QS_OBJ_(this);                                    // this queue object
00046         QS_U8_(e->dynamic_);             // the dynamic attribute of the event
00047         QS_EQC_(m_nFree);                            // number of free entries
00048         QS_EQC_(m_nMin);                         // min number of free entries
00049     QS_END_NOLOCK_()
00050 
00051     if (e->dynamic_ != (uint8_t)0) {                 // is it a dynamic event?
00052         //lint -e1773                               Attempt to cast away const
00053         ++((QEvent *)e)->dynamic_;          // increment the reference counter
00054                    // NOTE: cast the 'const' away, which is legitimate because
00055                    // it's a dynamic event
00056     }
00057 
00058     if (m_frontEvt != (QEvent *)0) {                // is the queue not empty?
00059                // the queue must be able to accept the event (cannot overflow)
00060         Q_ASSERT(m_nFree != (QEQueueCtr)0);
00061 
00062         ++m_tail;
00063         if (m_tail == m_end) {                       // need to wrap the tail?
00064             m_tail = (QEQueueCtr)0;                             // wrap around
00065         }
00066 
00067         m_ring[m_tail] = m_frontEvt;               // buffer the old front evt
00068 
00069         --m_nFree;                             // update number of free events
00070         if (m_nMin > m_nFree) {
00071             m_nMin = m_nFree;                         // update minimum so far
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     m_frontEvt = e;                        // stick the new event to the front
00076 
00077     QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00078 }
